articles.title: FIH Pro League: India women suffer 2-3 defeat to Argentina
articles.description: Argentina won the FIH Pro League crown, finishing with 42 points from 16 games, 10 clear of second placed Netherlands, who still have two games remaining.
articles.content:
Argentina won the FIH Pro League crown, finishing with 42 points from 16 games, 10 clear of second placed Netherlands, who still have two games remaining.

articles.title: FIH Pro League: Indian women's team registers famous win over Olympic silver medallist Argentina
articles.description: Gurjit's (37th, 61st minutes) two penalty corner conversions and Lalremsiami's (4th) field strike cancelled out Agustina Gorzelany's (22, 37th, 45th) hat-trick to take the match into the shoot-out.

articles.title: Indian women's team registers famous win over Olympic silver medallist Argentina in FIH Pro League
articles.description: Gurjit's (37th, 61st minutes) two penalty corner conversions and Lalremsiami's (4th) field strike cancelled out Agustina Gorzelany's (22, 37th, 45th) hat-trick to take the match into the shoot-out.
articles.content: Rotterdam: Gurjit Kaur scored a brace as the Indian women’s hockey team dished out a spirited performance to stun Olympic silver medallist Argentina 2-1 in the shoot-out after a 3-3 stalemate in regulation time in the first match of the double-leg FI... [2874 chars]

articles.title: Carlos Tevez closing in on first managerial role weeks after announcing retirement
articles.description: Rosario Central are set to appoint ex-Argentina hitman Carlos Tevez as their new manager after the forward confirmed his retirement from professional football
articles.content:

Carlos Tevez is close to landing his first managerial job with Argentine side Rosario Central.

articles.title: Canada beats El Salvador to reach semifinals at FIBA U18 Women's Americas tourney
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina — Fatima Diakhate and Emma Koabel had 14 points apiece to lead Canada to a 92-24 rout of El Salvador in quarterfinal play Friday at the FIBA U18 Women's Americas Championship.
articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES, Argentina — Fatima Diakhate and Emma Koabel had 14 points apiece to lead Canada to a 92-24 rout of El Salvador in quarterfinal play Friday at the FIBA U18 Women's Americas Championship.
